Buildings

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • Buildings.Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBuilding, IObservers, ISubject

    public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBuilding, ISubject, IObservers
    Produces Building class which instantiates Properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Building(java.lang.String name, Campus campus)
      Populates current object with provided paramaters and default details, produces List for all floors within building.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Building

        public Building(java.lang.String name,
                Campus campus)
        Populates current object with provided paramaters and default details, produces List for all floors within building. Registers Building to observers list.
        Parameters:
        name - String - New Building name
        campus - Campus - giving all campus details.
